$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor autocomplete

model.description: Claude model to use for queries

maxTurns.description: Maximum number of agentic turns per query

permissionTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for standard tool permission prompts

extendedPermissionTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for extended permission prompts (e.g. EnterPlanMode, ExitPlanMode)

drowningThreshold.description: Seconds remaining on permission timer before the drowning alert (flashing + beep). Set to null to disable.

autoApproveEdits.description: Auto-approve Edit and Write tools for files inside the working directory

autoApproveReads.description: Auto-approve read-only tools (Read, Glob, Grep, LS, Skill) without prompting
